string.name: photopicker_application_label
string.translation_description: Label for the application that handles picking media files to share with other apps. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: photopicker_media_item
string.translation_description: Accessibility text denoting an element that represents an individual photo or video in a grid of selectable media. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: photopicker_item_selected
string.translation_description: Accessibility text denoting an individual photo is selected in a grid of photos. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: photopicker_item_not_selected
string.translation_description: Accessibility text denoting an individual photo is not selected in a grid of photos. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: photopicker_select_action_description
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for describing the action to select. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: photopicker_deselect_action_description
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for describing the action to deselect. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: photopicker_done_button_label
string.translation_description: Button label that confirms the selected items and closes the photopicker.

string.name: photopicker_clear_selection_button_description
string.translation_description: Button Accessibility description that unselects all selected media items.

string.name: photopicker_photos_nav_button_label
string.translation_description: Button label that gives the user the option to navigate to a grid of their photos.

string.name: photopicker_albums_nav_button_label
string.translation_description: Button label that gives the user the option to navigate to a grid of their albums.

string.name: photopicker_photos_empty_state_title
string.translation_description: Title of the message shown to the user when there are no photos to show

string.name: photopicker_photos_empty_state_body
string.translation_description: Message shown to the user when no photos are able to be shown underneath the primary message title

string.name: photopicker_camera_empty_state_body
string.translation_description: Title of the message shown to the user when there are no photos in the camera album

resources.string: Photos and videos captured by your camera app will appear here

string.name: photopicker_favorites_empty_state_title
string.translation_description: Title of the message shown to the user when there are no favorite photos to show

string.name: photopicker_favorites_empty_state_body
string.translation_description: Message shown to the user when there are no favorite photos to show

resources.string: Photos and videos marked as favorites, or starred, will appear here

string.name: photopicker_videos_empty_state_title
string.translation_description: Title of the message shown to the user when there are no videos to show

string.name: photopicker_videos_empty_state_body
string.translation_description: Message shown to the user when there are no videos to show

resources.string: Videos captured by your camera app, saved, or shared will appear here

string.name: photopicker_back_option
string.translation_description: Button content description that gives the user the option to navigate back to the parent view.

string.name: photopicker_dismiss_banner_button_label
string.translation_description: Button label that gives the user the option to dismiss an informational banner
